p: The algorithm launched B independent boosting chains, each with S steps. Each boosting chain undergoes the standard gradient boosting procedure, starting with a residual of Y and updating every step. In each step, C Random Bits features ( C > 100) were generated, and the bit with the largest pseudo residual was chosen. The Random Bits from each independent boosting chain were collected to form a large (~10,000) feature pool. The Random Bits were stored in a compressed format requiring 1 bit per Random Bits per sample.
